column4: my webcam doesn't work with Skype but works with cheese, I'm running natty. any ideas?
just an idea. check if any other application using the camera is running, even if you closed; on skype test and configure it.
try sudo dpkg-reconfigure skype_or_the_name_of_package
see first on System Monitor if chesse or butter or whatever uses cam is working... because if cheese detects skype should
it works fine in cheese
ok, but goto system monitor and see... or logout and login
read above the suggestions :p
did you get skype recognizing the cam?
yes

from medibuntu or the skype webite?
